author: gk199
body:
#### PR description:

Updating the HCAL TDC LUTs for HB to match the TDC LUT deployed online on June 12. This is needed for HB TDC emulation and fine grain bit emulation to match the online settings. Elog for the TDC LUT update: http://cmsonline.cern.ch/cms-elog/1186628. This PR simply edits the existing LUT implementation in CMSSW to match online conditions. 

TDC LUTs not anticipated to be changed in Run 3. 

#### PR validation:

Tested in CMSSW_13_2_X_2023-06-15-2300, runTheMatrix.py passed.
title: HCAL: Updates to match HCAL TDC LUT deployed online June 12
